item_friendship_crafting_101.name: Familiar Metz
item_friendship_crafting_101.description: Metz, who always stays on her hat, rarely reveals its full form like this~

item_friendship_crafting_102.name: Journey
item_friendship_crafting_102.description: The girl had long embarked on her adventurous journey, but no matter how much time has passed, she will never forget her original self.

item_friendship_crafting_103.name: Perfect: Ultimate Otter
item_friendship_crafting_103.description: The Ultimate Glistening Gold Otter! A special gift for the 41st anniversary of "Ultimate Warriors." A tribute to Otter's winning performance in Ultimate Warrior Battlefield's 40th Character Popularity Contest.

item_friendship_crafting_104.name: Midsomer Idol Albis
item_friendship_crafting_104.description: This is the new best-selling summer-themed figurine in Mirroria and it strikingly resembles someone familiar at first glance. It's rumored to be based on a popular administrator from Mirroria, although the creator firmly denies these claims.

item_friendship_crafting_105.name: Leia Figurine
item_friendship_crafting_105.description: Crafted based on Leia from the "Ultimate Weapon" smart servant series by Xiling Alliance Co. Ltd., the figurine completed under the meticulous supervision of Ms. Shelly and Ms. Ling Qiao can be described as the pinnacle of perfection.

item_friendship_crafting_106.name: Snowy Figurine
item_friendship_crafting_106.description: "Snowy is supposed to be based on a tiger! Not a cat!" This was the only comment put forth by Ms. Shelly and Ms. Ling Qiao about this figurine.

item_friendship_crafting_107.name: Lucky Tarot: Challenge
item_friendship_crafting_107.description: The tarot card that represents "challenge" in the popular VR game "Lucky Tarot." It conceals hidden magic.

item_friendship_crafting_108.name: Lucky Tarot: Boss
item_friendship_crafting_108.description: The tarot card that represents "boss" in the popular VR game "Lucky Tarot." It contains scary monsters.

item_friendship_crafting_109.name: Lucky Tarot: Banish
item_friendship_crafting_109.description: The tarot card that represents "banish" in the popular VR game "Lucky Tarot." Its precious transmission power was actually used by a magician for a practical joke.

item_friendship_crafting_110.name: Laser Card: Tata
item_friendship_crafting_110.description: A lasered commemorative card issued in celebration of Otter's victory in Ultimate Warrior Battlefield's 40th Character Popularity Contest.

item_friendship_crafting_111.name: Laser Card: Kirala
item_friendship_crafting_111.description: A lasered commemorative card issued in celebration of Magical Girl Kirala's debut at a major merch convention.

item_friendship_crafting_112.name: Laser Card: Mi-a
item_friendship_crafting_112.description: Looks like there are Mi-a fans among the organizers of this merch convention...

item_friendship_crafting_113.name: Phantom Dolphin Model
item_friendship_crafting_113.description: A highly precise metallic phantom dolphin model. Its brilliant colors have attracted countless people to stop by.

item_friendship_crafting_114.name: Scylla Model
item_friendship_crafting_114.description: A highly precise metallic Scylla model. Its structure is exquisite and complex, making it highly valued by figure enthusiasts.

item_friendship_crafting_115.name: Venue-Limited Peanut Figurine
item_friendship_crafting_115.description: An upgraded version of the Peanut figurine. In addition to having data storage and voice control functions, movable joints were also added to allow the body to move more freely, leading it to receive rave reviews.

item_friendship_crafting_116.name: 1/7 Venus
item_friendship_crafting_116.description: A metallic Venus model that perfectly reproduces the appearance of Venus. Unfortunately, the design blueprint of Venus was lost and its internal structure could not be reproduced.

item_friendship_crafting_117.name: Venue-Limited Void Angel
item_friendship_crafting_117.description: In order to deal with the tedious problem of handling the original pure white color, a limited edition of different-colored Void Angels was specially launched.

item_friendship_crafting_118.name: Dream Star Mini
item_friendship_crafting_118.description: An exquisite miniature Dream Star model. Not only was the internal mechanical structure recreated, but its painting was also perfectly replicated.

item_friendship_mould_1.name: Merch Mold Type I
item_friendship_mould_1.description: A professional merch-making mold. Suitable for making humanoid merch.

item_friendship_mould_2.name: Merch Mold Type II
item_friendship_mould_2.description: A professional merch-making mold. Suitable for making card merch.

item_friendship_mould_3.name: Merch Mold Type III
item_friendship_mould_3.description: A professional merch-making mold. Suitable for making mechanical merch.

item_friendship_material_1.name: Pro Sprayer
item_friendship_material_1.description: An indispensable tool for merch production. It gives you a fast and even coloring experience.

item_friendship_material_2_1.name: Paint Reinforcer Type I
item_friendship_material_2_1.description: Collected from various regions of Aesperia, it can significantly improve the color application power of paints. Stored in red bottles for easy identification.

item_friendship_material_2_2.name: Paint Reinforcer Type II
item_friendship_material_2_2.description: Collected from various regions of Vera, it can significantly improve the durability of paints. Stored in yellow bottles for easy identification.

item_friendship_material_2_3.name: Paint Reinforcer Type III
item_friendship_material_2_3.description: Collected from various regions of Domain 9, it can significantly improve the concealing power of paints. Stored in blue bottles for easy identification.

item_friendship_material_3_1.name: Shaping Crystal Type I
item_friendship_material_3_1.description: Crystalline ore with excellent hardness. Often used in the blades of carving knives.

item_friendship_material_3_2.name: Shaping Crystal Type II
item_friendship_material_3_2.description: Crystalline ore with a hard quality. Often used in the blades of carving knives.

item_friendship_coin.name: Pop-Up Gacha Ticket
item_friendship_coin.description: Ticket used for the Mirramoon Street Pop-Up Cafe Gachapon Machine.

Item_ChargerBattery_SpecialAP.name: Charging Component
Item_ChargerBattery_SpecialAP.description: Used to replenish the energy of the Charging Tower.

AvatarFrame03.name: Shining Star
AvatarFrame03.description: Never envy anyone else's light—you are the most brilliant shining star!

AvatarFrame04.name: Leader of Astra
AvatarFrame04.description: He's the leader of Astra as well as a brother, just one of the countless ordinary folks wanting to protect their family.

AvatarFrame06.name: Pure Illusion
AvatarFrame06.description: "Don't you go anywhere, I'm not done playing yet!"

AvatarFrame07.name: Call of the Dead
AvatarFrame07.description: For your own safety, I don't think you should annoy the lady.

AvatarFrame08.name: Absolute Authority
AvatarFrame08.description: Her order is her will. There's no compromise in her missions.

AvatarFrame12.name: Tower's Core
AvatarFrame12.description: Hope or destruction? Different people hold different perspectives on it.

AvatarFrame13.name: Expert Creator
AvatarFrame13.description: Nobody can go back and redo the past, but you can create a new future from now on.

AvatarFrame14.name: SciFi World
AvatarFrame14.description: SciFi World December 2021 Issue Collaboration Exclusive Rewards.

AvatarFrame15.name: Assistant
AvatarFrame15.description: "Mi-a will send you back to Hykros with a drone if you are defeated."

AvatarFrame16.name: Hanging Amusement Park
AvatarFrame16.description: Cetus Island amusement park - have fun like never before!

AvatarFrame17.name: Champion Shopkeeper
AvatarFrame17.description: I don't want to be an Executor. I just wanna make dinner with you, Mi-a!

AvatarFrame18.name: Top Construction Team
AvatarFrame18.description: Every single drop of sweat and every single brick... I have to record every engineer's contribution to our construction efforts.

AvatarFrame19.name: Dawn: Morning Light
AvatarFrame19.description: The night is darkest before the dawn.

AvatarFrame20.name: Moon: Crossing Light
AvatarFrame20.description: May the moon's white light guide you through the dark.

AvatarFrame21.name: Peace and Joy
AvatarFrame21.description: The time has come to hang festive lanterns and welcome the coming spring.

AvatarFrame22.name: Tipsy
AvatarFrame22.description: Colorful dreams and intoxicating love, all in one piece of chocolate.

AvatarFrame23.name: Companion
AvatarFrame23.description: Part of the past has become a bubble in memory, but there are still things at hand that can be held tightly and never let go of.

AvatarFrame24.name: Outside Body
AvatarFrame24.description: Isn't it rather superficial to cast judgement on what life is or is not?

AvatarFrame26.name: Knight of Night
AvatarFrame26.description: A silent, vigilant guard, now protecting your machine pod.

AvatarFrame27.name: Pawpaw Treasure
AvatarFrame27.description: How many treasures did Smarty hide in the Pawpaw House? I'm curious.

AvatarFrame28.name: Pumpkin Night
AvatarFrame28.description: Pumpkins, pumpkins, pumpkins! I need more pumpkins!

AvatarFrame29.name: Memories
AvatarFrame29.description: Some things can remind us of our life before the Cataclysm.

AvatarFrame30.name: Gaze Mirroria
AvatarFrame30.description: Fantasies that span across the plane converge here.

AvatarFrame31.name: Steel Lizard Charge
AvatarFrame31.description: Lizards are also a type of dragon, so the Steel Lizard Charge is also a kind of dragon vehicle.

AvatarFrame32.name: Off-Balance Dancer
AvatarFrame32.description: Beneath the gorgeous skirt are crisis, mystery, and fear.

AvatarFrame34.name: Journey Nursery Rhyme
AvatarFrame34.description: Welcome back, Mi-a! Let's continue our journey.

AvatarFrame35.name: Cordate Jellybean
AvatarFrame35.description: Sweetness and love, all hidden in the small jellybeans.

AvatarFrame36.name: Naughty Trails
AvatarFrame36.description: Forget about all your anxieties and worries, and have a good time on Cetus Island!

AvatarFrame37.name: Aroma of Leaves
AvatarFrame37.description: Wrapped in jade and tied with rainbow, you chewy little pudding endearing like snow.

AvatarFrame38.name: Pure White Conversion
AvatarFrame38.description:
"Hey… do you think we can still win this one? The Violet Core is shattered. I guess we can't win this one. The enemy is too powerful."
"Regardless, I still have faith in the Violet Core and ourselves. I believe in the power of valor and justice."
"There's something strange about the Violet Core! Is that... a white light!?"

AvatarFrame39.name: Chief Park Ranger
AvatarFrame39.description: The maintenance of the park is complete! Dear customer, do you wanna join us for a ride?

AvatarFrame40.name: Salty Wave
AvatarFrame40.description: Beach, sand castle, aren't they the best matches for the salty soda?

AvatarFrame41.name: Summer Cool
AvatarFrame41.description: The fishtail swayed lightly, raising a trace of coolness in the heat.

AvatarFrame42.name: Sparkler Bouquet
AvatarFrame42.description: Compared with common bouquets, this exclusive festival decoration not only has sound effects and motion effects, but it also feels hot!

AvatarFrame43.name: Nurse Trainee
AvatarFrame43.description: They may not be experienced, but their sincere wish to help the Astra Shelter has made them shine.

AvatarFrame44.name: Fantasy Park
AvatarFrame44.description: Exclusive to the Fantasy Park theme event in the Douliu Community.

AvatarFrame45.name: Friend Astray
AvatarFrame45.description: Although she got lost on her way to her sister's cabin, she met two gentle but powerful knights and their elf companions.

AvatarFrame46.name: Watermelon Feast
AvatarFrame46.description: Should I slice it or cut it into chunks? Or maybe scoop it up with a spoon!?

AvatarFrame47.name: Attention of the Pool
AvatarFrame47.description: Even if unbeknownst to them, the gravitas of a celebrity is hard to hide...

AvatarFrame48.name: Responsibilities of a Disciplinarian
AvatarFrame48.description: I shall maintain the discipline of Mirroria School!

AvatarFrame49.name: Part-time Job
AvatarFrame49.description: You'll often see her sitting in Mirafleur Hall or at the Security Force entrance. However, in principle, she should stay at the Furnace Core Site, right?

AvatarFrame50.name: Carpe Diem
AvatarFrame50.description: Seize the day. You never know what will happen.

AvatarFrame51.name: Speed Chaser
AvatarFrame51.description: Lighting up your path to the future with my taillights!

AvatarFrame53.name: Annual Harvest
AvatarFrame53.description: Share your great harvest with friends.

AvatarFrame55.name: Fisherman's Honor
AvatarFrame55.description: It took the bait! Such a momentous occasion should be witnessed by everyone.

AvatarFrame56.name: Cleaning Sequence
AvatarFrame56.description: Mi-a cleans as efficiently as any sweeper droid!

AvatarFrame57.name: Blood Moon
AvatarFrame57.description: On a treacherous night such as this, it is not smart to stay outside. Please, guests... Return to the castle and rest.

AvatarFrame58.name: Windchaser
AvatarFrame58.description: Not even the driving gale can keep up with it.

AvatarFrame_60.name: Stylish Straw Hat
AvatarFrame_60.description: Wearing it, you can feel the passing breeze, and establish a deep friendship with your comrades. But there is no style at all. None whatsoever.

AvatarFrame_61.name: One Year of Joy
AvatarFrame_61.description: Get together with your friends and have a merry time.

AvatarFrame_62.name: Cake and Festivities
AvatarFrame_62.description: Otter has prepared a cake with great care. There are also many surprises!

AvatarFrame_63.name: Colorful Time
AvatarFrame_63.description: The collision of inspiration bursts into dreamy colors. Because of you, Mi-a becomes brilliant now.

AvatarFrame_64.name: Stars in the Sea
AvatarFrame_64.description: The ocean has been veiled in darkness for a long time. But, from that day on, lights suddenly began to light up within the void, one-after-another. Since then, the ocean has taken on a new, brighter look.

AvatarFrame_65.name: Dragon's Roar
AvatarFrame_65.description: The roaring dragon breathes fire and devours everything.

AvatarFrame_66.name: Of the Blue Realm
AvatarFrame_66.description: This is the sea, somewhere I call home.

AvatarFrame_67.name: Dream Adventure
AvatarFrame_67.description: You've proven to be the most amazing encounter. Happy Anniversary!

AvatarFrame_68.name: Consensus
AvatarFrame_68.description: The deal is carved in stone.

AvatarFrame_69.name: Reindeer & Bell
AvatarFrame_69.description: The melodic bell tones usher in the full season's blessings.

AvatarFrame_70.name: Commitment
AvatarFrame_70.description: That is our promise to each other.

AvatarFrame_71.name: Rabbit Rally
AvatarFrame_71.description: The New Year's Mi-a is a bunny, a sight so lovely!

AvatarFrame_72.name: Bunny Surprise
AvatarFrame_72.description: Let Dolly offer the first surprise of the new spring!

AvatarFrame_73.name: Primal Judgement
AvatarFrame_73.description: She doesn't care what means are used, as long as the goal is achieved.

AvatarFrame_74.name: Platinum Armor Trial
AvatarFrame_74.description:
"Don't be nervous, Alyss! Relax, don't be so tight!"
"Everybody's watching and waiting for the new form's performance data. I got to treat this seriously..."

AvatarFrame_76.name: Taste of Destiny
AvatarFrame_76.description: To capture a person's heart, you must first capture...

AvatarFrame_77.name: Looming Shadow
AvatarFrame_77.description: Which one of the two shadows is the true self?

AvatarFrame_78.name: Good Manners
AvatarFrame_78.description: Having proper etiquette and knowing what to say doesn't mean someone excels at socializing.

AvatarFrame_79.name: Rearrival
AvatarFrame_79.description: The body is just a vessel. I don't mind looking like this.

AvatarFrame_80.name: Surface Scanner
AvatarFrame_80.description: There are patterns within the void. Find and create orderly rifts to roam between dimensions.

AvatarFrame_81.name: The Wind and the Moat
AvatarFrame_81.description: Wind and waves rush past Domain 9, starting a new chapter.

AvatarFrame_82.name: Vermilion Auspicium
AvatarFrame_82.description: The vermilion flame emblem is one of the symbols of Ignisville.

AvatarFrame_83.name: Micius Kite
AvatarFrame_83.description: The ingenuity of humans can rival the miracles of nature.

Avatar03.name: Shirli
Avatar03.description: Remember not to burn the food again!

Avatar04.name: Zeke
Avatar04.description: I want to spend my days with my family in peace and quiet, but that's just an unrealistic delusion in the last days.

Avatar05.name: Frigg
Avatar05.description: Perhaps she'd appreciate you if you weren't opposing her?

Avatar06.name: Nemesis
Avatar06.description: Are you Shirli or something else now?

Avatar08.name: Seele
Avatar08.description: The adorable appearance befits the playful cruelty.

Avatar09.name: Tata
Avatar09.description: A lazy smart servant who offers the help you need when necessary.

Avatar10.name: Happy New Year
Avatar10.description: I wanted to personally give this to you—a New Year's gift from Mi-a.

Avatar11.name: May All Go Well
Avatar11.description: I believe these are called "fireworks"...? I wonder if they would look nicer on your Jetpack...

Avatar12.name: Angel Frigg
Avatar12.description: She isn't a demon, after all.

Avatar13.name: Alf
Avatar13.description: Alf looks like a lucky cat! Could it bring me good luck if I hug it every day?

Avatar14.name: Peanut
Avatar14.description: The first-gen smart servant with outstanding performance. Your trustworthy friend.

Avatar16.name: Mad Dimon
Avatar16.description: Mad Dimon, a once-popular electric pet, is now your smart servant companion.

Avatar17.name: Tartarus
Avatar17.description: Its prototype was the most popular children's toy before the Cataclysm. Recently, its manufacturer has invented a brand new smart servant called "Tartarus."

Avatar18.name: Infernal Steel Lizard
Avatar18.description: What are you staring at? Taste my steel lizard tail!

Avatar19.name: Song of the Puppet
Avatar19.description: She was shouting, she was dancing, and she was sobbing.

Avatar20.name: Dolly
Avatar20.description: Dolly is unique to me, and I am unique to Dolly...

Avatar21.name: Mi-a's Dream
Avatar21.description: While asleep, does Mi-a dream about... me and Shirli?

Avatar22.name: Strawberry Afternoon
Avatar22.description: Why does the crow look like a desk?

Avatar23.name: Hanna
Avatar23.description: Welcome to Cetus Island! Let me show you around.

Avatar24.name: Sticky Rice Ball
Avatar24.description: Let me guess, am I holding a sweet dumpling or meat dumpling? Oh, I've got it right!

Avatar25.name: Pure White Core
Avatar25.description: Purple fades as white shines through. It's a new force that can light up the night sky.

Avatar27.name: Celebration Memories
Avatar27.description: Do you remember the funny things that happened at the Graceday Celebration, little goldfish?

Avatar28.name: Summer Celebration Mechanic
Avatar28.description: Testing the new entertainment equipment is for the celebration activities, while she adjusted herself through the celebration.

Avatar29.name: Fledgling
Avatar29.description: This is the first person you meet at the beginning of a new, clean slate journey.

Avatar30.name: Joy Ride
Avatar30.description: Little Red Riding Hood carefully prepared a basket full of snacks and went out to play with her sister!

Avatar31.name: Fruity Summer
Avatar31.description: The essential cooldown for a scorching summer! Mi-a can't resist sweet frozen watermelons!

Avatar32.name: Rare Holiday
Avatar32.description: She needs more rest than she thought. That's not a bad thing, is it?

Avatar33.name: Traveling Shirli
Avatar33.description: The last stop of the journey: Mirroria!

Avatar34.name: Saki Fuwa the Disciplinarian
Avatar34.description: Who would've thought that the anime fangirl at every limited-merch sale would be so strict at school!

Avatar35.name: Reliable Mechanic
Avatar35.description: At least, that's how she refers to herself...

Avatar36.name: End-Track
Avatar36.description: Ride like the wind! Passion is forever young.

Avatar38.name: I'm a fisherman
Avatar38.description: Fishing rods, hooks, lines, protection... and helmets. Why would someone wear a helmet when fishing? Ahem... Anyway, best to be prepared!

Avatar39.name: Chef Mi-a
Avatar39.description: Mi-a is currently executing food preparation sequence, please wait...

Avatar40.name: Puppet
Avatar40.description: No one has seen the face of the heir of Millet Castle. Why did she decide to make an appearance now?

Avatar42.name: Mighty Big Sister
Avatar42.description: Well, at least she used to be.

Avatar43.name: One Year of Company
Avatar43.description: Thank you for your company along the way.

Avatar44.name: Engraved Memories
Avatar44.description: Remember all the scenes along the way and every moment that we spent together.

Avatar45.name: Sunflower
Avatar45.description: Embrace the light and warmth, blooming a warm and brilliant beauty.

Avatar_46.name: Fantasy Trip
Avatar_46.description: Look back and feel the wonder of this adventure. Happy anniversary!

Avatar_47.name: Reindeer & Mi-a
Avatar_47.description: On nights when the winter snow falls, share gifts together with Mi-a!

Avatar_48.name: Fanciful Dreamscape
Avatar_48.description: Will that day come for Zhuque? Is it an extravagant dream or a palpable future?

Avatar_49.name: Rabbit Mi-a
Avatar_49.description: Mi-a has put on a new outfit, go ring in the new year!

Avatar_50.name: Bunny Unleashed
Avatar_50.description: Bunny is unleashed with bunny surprises to wish you a Happy New Year!

Avatar_51.name: Valkyrie
Avatar_51.description: Who knows what hides beneath her casual smile?

Avatar_53.name: Platinum Armor Strike
Avatar_53.description:
M-sec 2000 Alyss will strike out in Platinum Armor!
Y-You sure this is how the line goes, Captain Fuwa?

Avatar_54.name: Combined Effort
Avatar_54.description: Will you listen to me play the arpeggio and feel the dreamlike sea?

Avatar_56.name: Molinia
Avatar_56.description: She doesn't look like her older siblings, whom she admires very much. Maybe that's one reason why she's so self-conscious...

Avatar_57.name: Abyss Dominator
Avatar_57.description: Harrah? I like the name. As you wish, then...

Avatar_58.name: Scylla
Avatar_58.description: Roam through the rifts, sing in the void.

Avatar_59.name: Flaming Finch
Avatar_59.description: Red little balls that can be found everywhere.

Avatar_60.name: Ling Qiao
Avatar_60.description: I'm Ling Qiao from Niners Heavy Machinery. Leave the research and development commissions to me!

Mount_005.name: Dust Wheeler
Mount_005.description: Crude and eye-catching. If it's presence and personality you're after, look no further. However, since someone noticed its antennae look like little feelers, everyone started to think it was rather cute, which in turn attracted more buyers. Duplicates are converted to 100 dark crystals and 20,000 gold.

Mount_006.name: Crimson Meteor
Mount_006.description:
Glamorous! Radiant! It's the brightest crimson star in your vehicle collection!
Note: Crimson Meteor cannot hit triple speed. Please drive carefully.

Mount_007.name: Mechbird
Mount_007.description:
The new vehicle designed and built by Cobalt-B that is both fun and practical.
Cobalt-B had some rather unique names planned, but the marketing department put the kibosh on it: an easy-to-remember name is a good name.

Mount_008.name: Aidan Knight
Mount_008.description: Although this motorcycle is small, it is wholly equipped. Low cost, energy-efficient, with sufficient storage space, it is not only an excellent choice for couriers, but has become popular among traveling merchants in recent years.

Mount_002_a.name: Magnetic Rod
Mount_002_a.description:
This is not for hanging clothes out to dry!

An abandoned tower in the Rusty Belt. Is someone trying to put something on it?

Mount_002_b.name: Maglev Stalker
Mount_002_b.description:
It's not a vacuum robot!

The Vermin Brothers' cherished possession and possibly a future table riser. Low-probability drop from the Vermin Brothers.

Low-probability drop from Venomfang: Echidna in Vera: Sandstorm Grounds, and from Venomfang: Medusa, Venomfang: Stheno, and Venomfang: Euryale in Vera: Quicksand Belt.

Mount_003_a.name: Omnium Beast: Cockpit
Mount_003_a.description:
A comfy cabin that jolts when moving?

The workers on the drilling rig probably missed something.

Mount_003_b.name: Omnium Beast: Left Arm
Mount_003_b.description:
An Omnium-powered left arm of the cyberbeast. Please remain in your cabin and do not ride on the arm.

A gift from Bai Ling for those proficient in puzzle-solving in the shelter.

Mount_003_c.name: Omnium Beast: Right Arm
Mount_003_c.description:
An Omnium-powered right arm of the cyberbeast. Please remain in your cabin and do not ride on the arm.

Behemoths wandering Banges, Navia, and Crown are probably equipped with it. Low-probability drop from Behemoth - Surtur, Behemoth - Bergelmir, Behemoth - Fárbauti, Behemoth - Mimir, and Behemoth - Utgarda.

Low-probability drop from Raging Horn: Sergey in Vera: Rock Pillar Gobi, and from Bugle: Garrette in Vera: Quicksand Belt.

Mount_011_a.name: Voyager Engine
Mount_011_a.description:
"Voyager exclusive!" the user manual warns in a bright font. But it's almost never seen with the component.

The workers on the drilling rig probably missed something.

Mount_011_b.name: Voyager Thruster
Mount_011_b.description:
Compact and versatile with all the essential parts... Actually, every part is essential.

The Four Powers in the Navia region could carry it. Low-probability drop from Four Powers - Okka, Four Powers - Hethlu, Four Powers - Smoli, and Four Powers - Sendyrs.

Low-probability drop from Blast Rock: Fafnir in Vera: Rock Pillar Gobi, and from Boom Rock: Tungchro in Vera: Quicksand Belt.

Mount_011_c.name: Voyager Control Station
Mount_011_c.description:
Control room for the Voyager. It compels you to shout "Onward!" for some reason.

The Heirs of Aida hid stuff in their stronghold on the dock.

Mount_011_d.name: Voyager Hull
Mount_011_d.description:
The first thing you'll want to do is give it a new paint job...

Hykros researchers would leave practical tools in the Ecological Stations in Navia.

Mount_004_a.name: Unicorn Power Core
Mount_004_a.description:
This vehicle engine is patent-pending, so no reverse engineering.

You might find something around the marvelous ore.

Mount_004_b.name: Unicorn Bionic Frame
Mount_004_b.description:
Hykros scholars once had a big fight over the material choice for bionics. The two sides submitted their own papers... So did the side with more papers win?

The dawn of new grounds for the Aida Bastion has come.

Mount_004_c.name: Unicorn Cyberlimbs
Mount_004_c.description:
"Cyberlimbs are cool!"... Wonder how many people that slogan will draw to buy the Monocross.

It's probably exhausting hauling boxes up the tower in Saag Passage.

Mount_004_d.name: Unicorn Head
Mount_004_d.description:
The head is armed with a defensive dagger, which is often treated as an accessory, hence the "Unicorn" moniker. I wonder how the creator feels about that.

Devotees of the Hyenas in the Crown region might carry it. Low-probability drop from Devotee Noah and Devotee Eber.

Low-probability drop from Gilded: Abela in Vera: Sandstorm Grounds, and from Sacred Gold: Carrandi in Vera: Rock Pillar Gobi.

Mount_013.description:
Complete the mission Franz's Gift to use.
A unique cube-shaped vehicle. Its built-in floating power unit allows it to move easily, even on bumpy roads. However, its flashy tape lights make it looks like a moving disco ball, and it is particularly obvious at night.

aige.name: Echo
aige.description: Good or bad? You be the judge.

bailing.name: Bai Ling
bailing.description: Could you stop looking at me like that? You're embarrassing me.

gulan.name: Cobalt-B
gulan.description: Through the blue cobalt glass, we can observe the actual color of the flame of burning metal.

hida.name: Hilda
hida.description: Move your body to the music by the sea. Let your thoughts drift with the waves to the other side.

kekelite.name: Cocoritter
kekelite.description: Sugar, stuffed toys, and all the sweet and gentle things in the world.

kelaodiya.name: Claudia
kelaodiya.description: Come to me if you need any help. I'll do my best.

king.description: I've been told millions of times that there's a fierce look in my eyes. Not sure how much these sunglasses will help with that.

ling.name: Zero
ling.description: Analyzing data. Please don't bother me for now.

saimier.name: Samir
saimier.description: There must be an unsolvable mystery, an endless road, and an unpredictable future.

sifengyuanyu.name: Tsubasa
sifengyuanyu.description: Her eyes wander because she's always on guard for the invisible dangers in the air.

peipei.name: Pepper
peipei.description: Wearing a smile at work is a demand she requires of herself.

wuwan.name: Crow
wuwan.description: As an entertainer, I certainly want your eyes on me all the time.

xiluo.name: Shiro
xiluo.description: Keep your distance and be patient. A gentle reminder: you might get attacked by the kitty claw if you stare at her for too long.

xiuma.name: Huma
xiuma.description: Like a blank piece of paper waiting for you to paint on it.

make.name: Marc
make.description: Every one of us is a unique creation.

baiyuekui.name: Bai Yuekui
baiyuekui.description: All sentient beings share the same pure and perfect spark essence of enlightenment.

Item_firework.name: Black niter
Item_firework.description: A rare rock from Aida used for making fireworks and not much else.

Item_Gashapon_coin_01.name: Cetus Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_01.description: The gachapon coin that carries the best wishes of all the little Smart Servants on Cetus Island will definitely bring good luck!

Item_Gashapon_coin_02.name: Golden Sands Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_02.description: A gachapon coin engraved with a pyramid pattern, bringing the desert into the palm of your hand.

Item_Gashapon_coin_03.name: Starry Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_03.description: A gachapon coin engraved with stars, bringing the music of the starry night to your ears.

Item_Gashapon_coin_04.name: Fantasy Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_04.description: A fantasy gachapon coin. Hold it tight in your hand, so you know it's real.

Item_Gashapon_coin_05.name: Wormwood Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_05.description: A gachapon coin with the fragrance of wormwood. It makes for a good collectible probably.

Item_Gashapon_coin_06.name: Pure White Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_06.description: A gachapon coin that refracts the light from pure white core. This gachapon coin is also really... an ultimate one!

Item_Gashapon_coin_07.name: Seabreeze Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_07.description: A gachapon coin with the salty smell of the sea breeze. It's time to go on a vacation!

Item_Gashapon_coin_08.name: Memories Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_08.description: Whenever you stop to look, memories come flooding in.

Item_Gashapon_coin_09.name: Crimson Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_09.description: A magical item described in the picture book Crimson Tales. It's said to be chocolate-scented?

Item_Gashapon_coin_12.name: Remembrance Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_12.description: A gachapon coin that contains wonderful memories. The summer breeze blew away the youthful worries...

Item_Gashapon_coin_15.name: Pure White Gachapon Coin (Reissue)
Item_Gashapon_coin_15.description: A gachapon coin that refracts the light from pure white core. This gachapon coin is also really... an ultimate one!

Item_Gashapon_coin_16.name: Rosy Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_16.description: A special invitation from the costume party. The danger inside cannot be evaded.

Item_Gashapon_coin_22.name: Pure White Gachapon Coin (Winter Reissue)
Item_Gashapon_coin_22.description: A gachapon coin that refracts the light from pure white core. This gachapon coin is also really... an ultimate one!

Item_Gashapon_coin_29.name: Crimson Gachapon Coin (Reissue)
Item_Gashapon_coin_29.description: A magical item described in the picture book Crimson Tales. It's said to be chocolate-scented?

Item_Gashapon_coin_34.name: Fantasy Gachapon Coin (Reissue)
Item_Gashapon_coin_34.description: A fantasy gachapon coin. Hold it tight in your hand, so you know it's real.

Item_Gashapon_coin_35.name: Starry Gachapon Coin (Reissue)
Item_Gashapon_coin_35.description: A gachapon coin engraved with stars, bringing the music of the starry night to your ears.

Item_Gashapon_coin_38.name: Pure White Gachapon Coin (Reissue III)
Item_Gashapon_coin_38.description: A gachapon coin that refracts the light from pure white core. This gachapon coin is also really... an ultimate one!

Item_Gashapon_coin_40.name: Crimson Gachapon Coin (Reissue II)
Item_Gashapon_coin_40.description: A magical item described in the picture book Crimson Tales. It's said to be chocolate-scented?

Item_Gashapon_coin_41.name: Seabreeze Gachapon Coin (Reissue)
Item_Gashapon_coin_41.description: A gachapon coin with the salty smell of the sea breeze. It's time to go on a vacation!

Item_Gashapon_coin_43.name: Golden Sands Gachapon Coin (Reissue)
Item_Gashapon_coin_43.description: A gachapon coin engraved with a pyramid pattern, bringing the desert into the palm of your hand.

Item_Gashapon_coin_44.name: Rosy Gachapon Coin (Reissue)
Item_Gashapon_coin_44.description: A special invitation from the costume party. The danger inside cannot be evaded.

JiuYu_Gashapon_coin_1.name: AI R&D Contract I
JiuYu_Gashapon_coin_1.description: The materials utilized for each order are guaranteed, but due to the variance in workmanship, the product may not be a proper and whole smart servant. Development is not easy, so cherish the encounters you have with each and every smart servant.

Item_PetGashaponCoin.name: Smart Servant Customization Contract
Item_PetGashaponCoin.description: A smart servant carefully crafted with the specified materials and strictly following the blueprints. Each and every one is an outstanding smart servant.

Item_MidAutumnLantern.name: Silvermoon Flame
Item_MidAutumnLantern.description: A micro energy storing device designed in Mirroria. Despite its small size, it can actually store quite some energy. Suitable for lanterns and other illuminators.

Item_HalloweenPumpkin.name: Trick-or-Treat Pumpkin
Item_HalloweenPumpkin.description: A strange pumpkin of strange shape. Just one look at it will grant you the mysterious power to defeat your enemies.

Gossip_frag_1.name: Eight Trigrams Token: Sky
Gossip_frag_1.description: This appears to be a fragment of a stone tablet inscribed with "Sky." Piecing it together with other fragments may unlock a hidden mechanism.

Gossip_frag_2.name: Eight Trigrams Token: Earth
Gossip_frag_2.description: This appears to be a fragment of a stone tablet inscribed with "Earth." Piecing it together with other fragments may unlock a hidden mechanism.

Gossip_frag_3.name: Eight Trigrams Token: Jolt
Gossip_frag_3.description: This appears to be a fragment of a stone tablet inscribed with "Jolt." Piecing it together with other fragments may unlock a hidden mechanism.

Gossip_frag_4.name: Eight Trigrams Token: Wind
Gossip_frag_4.description: This appears to be a fragment of a stone tablet inscribed with "Wind." Piecing it together with other fragments may unlock a hidden mechanism.

Gossip_frag_5.name: Eight Trigrams Token: Aqua
Gossip_frag_5.description: This appears to be a fragment of a stone tablet inscribed with "Aqua." Piecing it together with other fragments may unlock a hidden mechanism.

Gossip_frag_6.name: Eight Trigrams Token: Ignis
Gossip_frag_6.description: This appears to be a fragment of a stone tablet inscribed with "Ignis." Piecing it together with other fragments may unlock a hidden mechanism.

Gossip_frag_7.name: Eight Trigrams Token: Mountain
Gossip_frag_7.description: This appears to be a fragment of a stone tablet inscribed with "Mountain." Piecing it together with other fragments may unlock a hidden mechanism.

Gossip_frag_8.name: Eight Trigrams Token: Marsh
Gossip_frag_8.description: This appears to be a fragment of a stone tablet inscribed with "Marsh." Piecing it together with other fragments may unlock a hidden mechanism.

Mount_014.name: Heavy Engine
Mount_014.description: A batch of retro yet high-tech heavy engines reclaimed from the ruins of an auto plant. Lighthouse R&D's modifications enable them to speed over winding roads and counterstrike gorgers.

Mount006_1_Skin_01.name: Smoothie Meteor
Mount006_1_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Comes with free dessert coupons. Are you sure you don't want to try the new smoothie?

Mount006_2_Skin_01.name: Surveyor Meteor
Mount006_2_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
A vehicle made with reference to the appearance of a famous oceanologist. Well, the cute expression, though, could make the oceanologist both hate and love the vehicle at the same time, I guess?

Mount006_3_Skin_01.name: Arena Meteor
Mount006_3_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
A small number of past arena audience members wished that he'd leave a small autograph on the vehicle... But it'd probably cost a fortune by doing it on each one.

Mount006_4_Skin_01.name: Absconder Meteor
Mount006_4_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
If he comes to us for the copyright payment, just tell him that the related personnel has already been fired.

Mount006_5_Skin_01.name: Windrunner Meteor
Mount006_5_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
The performance should be identical to other models, yet it feels faster riding in this one.

Mount006_6_Skin_01.name: Freedom Meteor
Mount006_6_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
When will we race on another planet? Freedom Meteor is ready!

Mount006_7_Skin_01.name: Roaming Meteor
Mount006_7_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Could it be an illusion that I always feel like an ace when I'm on this thing? Or maybe it's not an illusion at all?

Mount006_8_Skin_01.name: Scuba Meteor
Mount006_8_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Its reinforced hull can adapt to greater pressure underwater... But this was not meant to be operated undersea.

Mount006_9_Skin_01.name: Supercomputing Meteor
Mount006_9_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Equipped with a mini supercomputer that can deal with all kinds of road surfaces. It's just sometimes the computer is too small to handle a large amount of calculations, and errors could occur.

Mount006_10_Skin_01.name: Modular Meteor
Mount006_10_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Even a homebody can be a skilled driver thanks to the training they received in racing games.

Mount006_11_Skin_01.name: Nightfeather Meteor
Mount006_11_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Sweeping past the corners like a nightfeather. Are you sure you don't want a race?

Mount006_12_Skin_01.name: Reminiscent Meteor
Mount006_12_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Sit in this beauty and be a bright star shooting across the sky.

Mount006_13_Skin_01.name: Phantasmic Meteor
Mount006_13_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
One could dream of lightning-fast rides in this vehicle.

Mount006_14_Skin_01.name: Steady Meteor
Mount006_14_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
You would unconsciously slow down and drive safely in this one―Hey! What are these little critters doing behind us?

Mount006_15_Skin_01.name: DIY Meteor
Mount006_15_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Did some modifications to it when I happened to see it the other day. Not sure if its performance gets affected...

Mount006_16_Skin_01.name: Rockin' Meteor
Mount006_16_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Its music system has fifty Aida hit songs preloaded. Turn up the tunes, and go for a ride.

Mount006_17_Skin_01.name: Justice Meteor
Mount006_17_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Take this buddy with you on your journey of justice and redemption.

Mount006_18_Skin_01.name: Snow Rose Meteor
Mount006_18_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
It's said that you will impress the Queen of Snow Roses if you race and win the championship in this vehicle.

Mount006_19_Skin_01.name: Electrovision Meteor
Mount006_19_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Features fluorescent lights on gold paint to catch everyone's attention.

Mount006_20_Skin_01.name: Neon Meteor
Mount006_20_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Whoever drives it will definitely be the brightest neon lighting on the street.

Mount006_21_Skin_01.name: Inspirational Meteor
Mount006_21_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
You could seize inspiration before it disappears when driving around in this vehicle.

Mount006_22_Skin_01.name: Miraculous Meteor
Mount006_22_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Restart and seize the future... with you.

Mount006_23_Skin_01.name: Glowing Meteor
Mount006_23_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Though this is a vehicle inspired by a rebel, you should still follow the traffic rules while driving it.

Mount006_24_Skin_01.name: Frosty Meteor
Mount006_24_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Equipped with a powerful fridge and air conditioning. Not a bad idea to refit it as a beverage truck.

Mount006_25_Skin_01.name: EM Meteor
Mount006_25_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Unlike other vehicles, this one has an extra battery as the backup energy source. One can drive without worrying about running out of energy in Omnium-scarce areas.

Mount006_26_Skin_01.name: Pouncing Cat Meteor
Mount006_26_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Its music system was preloaded with sounds of cats in it. This might give you an edge when hunting down rodents. "Kitty is out for hunting! Where is the target? Give an order!"

Mount006_27_Skin_01.name: Flame Chaser Meteor
Mount006_27_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Transform into a shooting star on fire that no one can pass in a race.

Mount006_28_Skin_01.name: Med Meteor
Mount006_28_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Comes with a medical kit for safe journeys.

Mount006_29_Skin_01.name: Wishing Meteor
Mount006_29_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
If you happen to see a meteor shower while driving this vehicle, make a wish, and it might come true.

Mount_007_a.name: Mechbird: Head
Mount_007_a.description: "Want me to design the new vehicle? Okay, first, the child-like exterior will attract attention..."

Mount_007_b.name: Mechbird: Torso
Mount_007_b.description: "Trunk space or the radio... I don't want to give up either one..."

Mount_007_c.name: Mechbird: Legs
Mount_007_c.description: "It won't crumble even under a truckload of fallen fruit. Probably."

Mount_007_d.name: Mechbird: Core
Mount_007_d.description: "The newest creation from R&D. I had the kid try it out, and it's surprisingly comfortable."

Mount006_30_Skin_01.name: Demonic Meteor
Mount006_30_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Comment from one of the buyers: I heard it's created based on the appearance of a wicked demon, but... aww... I don't care. I just love it.

Mount006_31_Skin_01.name: Scarlet Meteor
Mount006_31_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
It's said that it can help you forget about your troubles when driving this vehicle.

leibei.name: Ruby
leibei.description: Spark and bunnies sent an invitation to the ball. Don't be late!

Mount_012_a.name: Jerboa Chassis
Mount_012_a.description: Made of special alloy, it is lightweight but solid. Its super strength makes it the ideal option for a variety of environments.

Mount_012_b.name: Jerboa Power Core
Mount_012_b.description: The power core was developed with cutting-edge energy technology. You never need to worry about the risk of your vehicle breaking down halfway.

douyu_gift_50jd.name: USD 50 JD Card
douyu_gift_50jd.description: This item is a voucher used to claim a physical prize from the Douyu "2.0 Vera Sector" mystery box draw event. Please contact customer service from the Settings screen to access the questionnaire and submit relevant information for prizes. Prizes will be issued outside the game. Redemptions are valid until 00:00, April 30 2022.

douyu_gift_RAZER.name: Razer Death Adder Elite
douyu_gift_RAZER.description: This item is a voucher used to claim a physical prize from the Douyu "2.0 Vera Sector" mystery box draw event. Please contact customer service from the Settings screen to access the questionnaire and submit relevant information for prizes. Prizes will be issued outside the game. Redemptions are valid until 00:00, April 30 2022.

douyu_gift_random.name: Random Peripheral
douyu_gift_random.description: This item is a voucher used to claim a physical prize from the Douyu "2.0 Vera Sector" mystery box draw event. Please contact customer service from the Settings screen to access the questionnaire and submit relevant information for prizes. Prizes will be issued outside the game. Redemptions are valid until 00:00, April 30 2022.

douyu_gift_GTX3080.name: GeForce RTX 3080
douyu_gift_GTX3080.description: This item is a voucher used to claim a physical prize from the Douyu "2.0 Vera Sector" mystery box draw event. For prizes, please contact customer service from the Settings screen to access the questionnaire and submit relevant information. Prizes will be issued outside the game. Redemptions are valid until 00:00 on May 25, 2022.

douyu_gift_iPhone13.name: iPhone 13
douyu_gift_iPhone13.description: This item is a voucher used to claim a physical prize from the Douyu "2.0 Vera Sector" mystery box draw event. For prizes, please contact customer service from the Settings screen to access the questionnaire and submit relevant information. Prizes will be issued outside the game. Redemptions are valid until 00:00 on May 25, 2022.

Mount_015.name: Desert Rider
Mount_015.description: A vehicle for two, designed with bionics and ergonomics in mind. Ride with a companion to kill time while zooming through the scorching desert.

bupoxiao.name: Saki Fuwa
bupoxiao.description: I will attack in Saki Fuwa form.

Mount012_1_Skin_01.name: Jumping Smart Servant
Mount012_1_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Jerboa all-terrain vehicles.
It's a customized version for a certain Wanderer and their lady companion. This smart servant must hold special meaning to the pair.

Mount012_2_Skin_01.name: Leaper
Mount012_2_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Jerboa all-terrain vehicles.
It may appear to be customized for a kid, but a Jerboa is a Jerboa!

Mount012_3_Skin_01.name: Ultimate Jerboa
Mount012_3_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Jerboa all-terrain vehicles.
It is named the Super Ultimate in hopes that its owner would also have super ultimate justice and valor!

linye.name: Lin
linye.description: She did allow her fans to use her photos, provided that it was not for commercial purposes, and only minor post-processing was done.

Mount_016.name: Warcart of Tomorrow
Mount_016.description: Once it accelerates to 888 miles per hour, it can break through the time barrier and go to any time period...

xinghuan.name: Lyra
xinghuan.description: I'm simply following Ms. Maidelin's orders, that's all.

Mount_017_a.name: Nova Engine
Mount_017_a.description: Don't underestimate its horsepower based on its cute appearance!

Mount_017_b.name: Nova Base
Mount_017_b.description: A three-wheeled design, stable and safe. Great for travel, food delivery, cargo transportation, and household essentials!

Mount_017_c.name: Nova Hull
Mount_017_c.description: I have to admit that this thing looks like a toy, but it's totally a different story on the manual...

tianlang.name: Tian Lang
tianlang.description: I am the owner of the Mirroria Nursery. Don't spill the beans on my alter ego!

AvatarFrame_Overseas_1.name: Greatest Creator
AvatarFrame_Overseas_1.description: Limited reward for outstanding creators during the CBT.

AvatarFrame_Overseas_2.name: Illusory Link
AvatarFrame_Overseas_2.description: Do we exist, or are we just shadows of some parallel universe?

AvatarFrame_tencent_1.name: Creatower
AvatarFrame_tencent_1.description: An outstanding ToF creator. We can tell you love the game!

AvatarFrame_tencent_2.name: Creatower Master
AvatarFrame_tencent_2.description: An extremely professional ToF creator. ToF is grateful to have an inspiration like you!

AvatarFrame_tencent_3.name: Creatower of Fantasy
AvatarFrame_tencent_3.description: A fantastical ToF creator, one who is already one with the team... You are already one with the team, congrats!

Avatar_Overseas_1.name: Zeke: Awakening
Avatar_Overseas_1.description: Maybe ol' Zeke can even be cute sometimes?

Avatar_Overseas_2.name: Shirli: Awakening
Avatar_Overseas_2.description: "Do I look silly to you when I smile?" Some dumb cute girl said so while swinging her fists.

Avatar_korea_1.name: Mi-a: Cute Version
Avatar_korea_1.description: Mi-a is currently executing the dressing sequence, please wait.

Avatar_korea_2.name: Nemesis: Cute Version
Avatar_korea_2.description: I think I had a dream. I saw a lot of things in this dream.

Avatar_korea_3.name: Shirli: Cute Version
Avatar_korea_3.description: Do we wanna go to Cetus Island together?

annabeila.name: Annabella
annabeila.description: How do the orders from her Master sound to her?

Mount_Racing_001.name: Thunder Roar
Mount_Racing_001.description: When its engine roared and it sped away, there was only one sound left ringing in the ears of the crowd: Thunder.

ailisi.name: Alyss
ailisi.description: Trust me! I will give it my all!

AvatarFrame_Overseas_3.name: Raging Sands
AvatarFrame_Overseas_3.description: The desert, where a new adventure begins.

Avatar_Overseas_8.name: The Queen
Avatar_Overseas_8.description: Want to taste my boot and chainsaw?

Mount_018.name: Rapid Propulsion
Mount_018.description: A popular vehicle in Aesperia, featuring outstanding acceleration and shock absorption systems. The bold paintwork on its wheels seems to emphasize the owner's unrestrained personality.

Avatar_FishKing_007.name: Blue Angelfish
Avatar_FishKing_007.description: A blue fish with white stripes and gold accents. It's hard to believe such a stunning fish even exists!

Avatar_FishKing_008.name: Flashy Angelfish
Avatar_FishKing_008.description: A variant of the fairy fish. Its stripes resemble lightning, making them even rarer.

Avatar_FishKing_009.name: Black Tigerfly Fish
Avatar_FishKing_009.description: This fish with tiger-like markings likes to hide in coral reefs, hence the name.

Avatar_FishKing_010.name: Round Sea Bream
Avatar_FishKing_010.description: Common snapper with round white scales that look like pearls.

Avatar_FishKing_011.name: Blue Surgeonfish
Avatar_FishKing_011.description: There is a sharp thorn at the tail. Be careful not to cut yourself.

Avatar_FishKing_012.name: Purple Puffer
Avatar_FishKing_012.description: The purple patterns on their bodies swell when they're angry.

Avatar_FishKing_013.name: High-Back Fish
Avatar_FishKing_013.description: Their high back give them strong dorsal fins and balance, enabling them to survive the sea without fear of being pushed around by the waves.

Avatar_FishKing_014.name: Green Snapper
Avatar_FishKing_014.description: The cyan back and dark red belly make this snapper highly recognizable.

Avatar_FishKing_015.name: Scarlet Eye
Avatar_FishKing_015.description: A terrifying deep-sea fish characterized by its red eyes.

Avatar_FishKing_016.name: Golden Stripe Puffer
Avatar_FishKing_016.description: With its long body and black tiger-like stripes, it is among the strongest fish in the sea.

Avatar_FishKing_017.name: Bell Fish
Avatar_FishKing_017.description: Their color is as beautiful as a bellflower.

Avatar_FishKing_018.name: Fruit Goby
Avatar_FishKing_018.description: A school of these fish swimming together looks like a cornucopia of fruit and vegetables coming toward you.

Avatar_FishKing_019.name: Fantasy Fish
Avatar_FishKing_019.description: The purple body is coated with creamy white stripes which emit a dazzling light under the sun.

Avatar_FishKing_020.name: Silver Bone
Avatar_FishKing_020.description: Its body is almost completely transparent. You can see its bones.

Avatar_FishKing_021.name: Lemon Yellow
Avatar_FishKing_021.description: It looks like a big lemon from a distance. It shouldn't taste sour, right?

Avatar_FishKing_022.name: Cloudy Angelfish
Avatar_FishKing_022.description: The new variety of fairy fish looks like a painting of a sunset.

Avatar_FishKing_023.name: Red Mane Fish
Avatar_FishKing_023.description: The red dorsal fin is their most distinctive feature, but the patterns elsewhere are more random.

Avatar_FishKing_024.name: Changing Fish
Avatar_FishKing_024.description: The dazzling pattern can change into a variety of colors under the refraction of seawater.

Avatar_FishKing_025.name: Wingless
Avatar_FishKing_025.description: With their bright green appearance, these fish look like they have no eyes. In fact, it is merely a pattern, and their eyes are hidden between the patterns.

Avatar_FishKing_026.name: Sparky Fish
Avatar_FishKing_026.description: Catching this fish was a marvellous surprise. Its white pattern flashing in the sunshine as it came out of the water was dazzling.

Avatar_FishKing_027.name: Maroon Night Goby
Avatar_FishKing_027.description: A rare species of goby. Their neon-lit bodies can be seen roaming around the ocean depths.

Avatar_FishKing_028.name: Midnight Fish
Avatar_FishKing_028.description: Their patterns can be seen even in the deep sea. What could possibly be a more pleasant surprise than catching one under the moonlight?

Avatar_FishKing_029.name: Green-Blue Fish
Avatar_FishKing_029.description: Even the most brilliant turquoise is not as dazzling as they are!

Avatar_FishKing_030.name: Angry Fish
Avatar_FishKing_030.description: As deep-sea fish, they are free to choose how to grow their bodies. The spikes are for defense. Fish growing like into this form can naturally run rampant in the sea.

Avatar_FishKing_031.name: Spiky Sea Bream
Avatar_FishKing_031.description: Outliers among snappers, their bones grow outside of their body. They use their hard bones to defend against their natural enemies. Their hard armor makes them mighty and unyielding, but this one still took the bait.

Avatar_FishKing_032.name: Anchovy
Avatar_FishKing_032.description: Their long, beautiful fins are as majestic as a phoenix's tail.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_001.name: Black Carp
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_001.description: Prefers to live near the bottom of lakes or rivers. It is stout somewhat tubular. Its name comes from the blue-black fins and scales above its white abdomen.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_003.name: Bighead Carp
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_003.description: Named for its wide head and short, rounded snout. The short dorsal fin tends toward the rear half of the spine. The back and spine are relatively dark with irregular black markings.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_004.name: Lanternfish
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_004.description: It has a flat body and separated dorsal fins. Yellowish glands beneath the scales create the golden color.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_005.name: Blackfin Grouper
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_005.description: Characterized by its all-black head and fins. Its lower jaw protrudes notably ahead of the upper jaw, and both its head and back exhibit remarkable bulges.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_007.name: Cyan Grouper
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_007.description: Characterized by its cyan-colored head and fins. Its lower jaw protrudes notably ahead of the upper jaw, and both its head and back exhibit remarkable bulges. A common species of grouper found in bodies of water in Aquaville.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_008.name: Scarlet Fin
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_008.description: It has a long, flat body, a stout back and abdomen, a continuous dorsal fin, and black fin stripes. It's known for being particularly delicious.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_009.name: Lava Gold
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_009.description: It boasts a small head, a humpbacked dorsal region, a plump body, and a gracefully flowing tail. It displays vibrant and flawless coloring.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_012.name: Striped Goby
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_012.description: A slender goby with blue stripes, separate dorsal fins, and soft fin spines.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_014.name: Red Dragonfish
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_014.description: While primarily golden in color, its fins are red and its scales have reddish edges. The large, reflective scales almost resemble enchanting rubies.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_015.name: Silver Dragonfish
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_015.description: Its body is greenish-silver, its fins are grayish-blue, and its scales have silvery-white edges with blue-green spots.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_016.name: Golden Dragonfish
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_016.description: Its large, flat body and dazzling golden body give it a highly-prized, majestic appearance. It has a protruding abdomen and whisker-like barbels on the lower jaw.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_018.name: Pearl Volt Dragon
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_018.description: It features an elongated body with a short, rounded snout. Its body is grayish-brown and adorned with pearl-like spots.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_019.name: Darkfrost Betta
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_019.description: It possesses a rather flat body shape, fine teeth on both upper and lower jaws, and a striking ice-white coloration on its tail and dorsal fins. It thrives in colder water temperatures.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_020.name: Snakehead
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_020.description: It has a wide, flat head and a cylindrical body that flattens near the end. The fins appear brightly-colored when underwater, but appear pale pink in the air.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_022.name: Pineneedle Koi
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_022.description: It is characterized by its golden-red scales adorned with scattered black markings, reminiscent of pine needles in the water.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_024.name: Golden-Cloud Minnow
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_024.description: Characterized by its long, flat shape and a colorful fluorescent stripe that runs across its body. The scales above the stripe are gold, while the scales below the stripe are gray. It is very fast but has average stamina.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_025.name: Crimson Betta
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_025.description: Characterized by its olive-shaped body and large, elegant fins. While its body is covered with red scales, its dorsal and tail fins display a beautiful red-to-white gradient and its pectoral fins have a colorful gradient of green, yellow, red, and white.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_026.name: Cardinalfish
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_026.description: It has a tall, flat, oval body with a blunt snout, a small mouth, and an abnormally raised section just behind the head. Its body is covered with colorful, iridescent patches.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_027.name: Lava Bream
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_027.description: It has an oval body with a blunt snout, small mouth, green-black spine, and red abdomen. Its name comes from its small, burning-red scales.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_028.name: Yellow Mackerel
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_028.description: Its slender, yellow body has lighter-yellow markings on the back and green-blue fins.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_029.name: Bluetooth Fish
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_029.description: Characterized by a round, flat body and a long, saw-like dorsal fin. It is covered with aquamarine-blue patterns that look like shark teeth. People like to eat its delicious meat.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_030.name: Vermilion Betta
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_030.description: Its body is reddish-orange with small pectoral fins and a long dorsal fin. The males are brighter and more aggressive.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_031.name: Red Goosehead Goldfish
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_031.description: Its body is short and thick with a continuous dorsal fin. The vivid contrast between its white body and the bright red spot on the top of its head makes it quite popular.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_032.name: Glass Catfish
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_032.description: It features a pointed snout, a broad and robust front body, and a slender, elongated rear half, resembling a willow leaf. Its transparent body allows for clear visibility of its spine, fishbones, fin rays, and internal organs.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_034.name: Butterfly Anchovy
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_034.description: A rare species of anchovy known for its beautiful appearance. It has a bright, orange-red body that gleams with a unique brilliance in the light, as well as a butterfly-shaped, violet tail that is large and elegant.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_035.name: Koi
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_035.description: It features a strong body and vivid, colorful patterns that are unique to each individual. It is said that they bring good luck.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_037.name: Emperor Carp
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_037.description: A large species of fish characterized by a long, slender body. It has a bright-red dorsal fin that is short and neat, as well as two long barbel on the bottom of its head. It is a powerful swimmer.

wumi.name: Umi
wumi.description: Bang Bang Bang! There you have it. Vera's most mysterious and elegant magician, Umi!

Mount_Racing_002.name: Mammoth
Mount_Racing_002.description: This superb car resembles a rushing mammoth when traversing treacherous terrain at high speeds.

MountWater1_a.name: Diamond Wings: Engine
MountWater1_a.description: The engine of Diamond Wings, the solo underwater thruster. It is one of the core components.

MountWater1_b.name: Diamond Wings: Frame
MountWater1_b.description: The frame of Diamond Wings, the solo underwater thruster. It is one of the core components.

MountWater1_c.name: Diamond Wings: Booster Fin
MountWater1_c.description: Booster fin of Diamond Wings, the solo underwater thruster. It is one of the core components.

MountWater1_d.name: Diamond Wings: Dorsal Fin
MountWater1_d.description: Dorsal fin of Diamond Wings, the solo underwater thruster. It is one of the core components.

MountWater2_a.name: Vision Sphere: Cabin
MountWater2_a.description: The view is good, but it's better to add a device to scrape off the seaweed that sticks on the window...

MountWater2_b.name: Vision Sphere: Engine
MountWater2_b.description: In fact, when resurfacing, it doesn't contract like a jellyfish every once in a while... It's a machine, after all.

MountWater3.name: Sunfish
MountWater3.description: The way it swims by propelling through the water is lithe and graceful like gliding in the air. Its delicate design allows it to move efficiently without disturbing the undersea creatures.

Avatar_FishKing_033.name: Lightning Eel
Avatar_FishKing_033.description: The slender rainbow figure is so inviting, but danger lurks behind such temptation.

Avatar_FishKing_034.name: Puffy Fish
Avatar_FishKing_034.description: Its puffed-up body serves to display its grand resentment of being caught.

Avatar_FishKing_035.name: Angry Puffy Fish
Avatar_FishKing_035.description: It's only natural to be angry when you get pulled up from the warm waters you call home.

Avatar_FishKing_036.name: Cross Fish
Avatar_FishKing_036.description: It is often used as an ornamental fish because of its beautiful tail.

Avatar_FishKing_037.name: Floppy Fish
Avatar_FishKing_037.description: Many people who do not know better will think that it's just a half-eaten fish put back to the sea.

Avatar_FishKing_038.name: Red Comet
Avatar_FishKing_038.description: Living in warmer waters gives them a reddish color. They swim so fast that they would occasionally wander into shallow water.

Avatar_FishKing_039.name: Lionfish
Avatar_FishKing_039.description: It normally likes to hide in the coral reef. The poisonous spines all over its body are not only dangerous, but also make it easy for the fish to get entangled in the fishing line.

Avatar_FishKing_040.name: Angry Lionfish
Avatar_FishKing_040.description: It prefers warmer waters. The fish struggles harder when it leaves the water, making it more likely to be entangled by the fishing line.

Avatar46.name: Fantasy Trip
Avatar46.description: Look back and feel the wonder of this adventure. Happy anniversary!

yikaluosi.name: Icarus
yikaluosi.description: Forever striving to reach what can never be attained.

feiouna.name: Fiona
feiouna.description: A bright tomorrow must be forged by our hands.

MountWater5.name: Drifter
MountWater5.description: Suitable for calm water, looking very comfortable as it moves quickly while drawing beautiful ripples. It can also handle certain wind speeds and waves. (Only usable on water and the ocean.)

genuonuo.name: Gnonno
genuonuo.description: She looks like she would never lose curiosity about the world and what lies beyond, no matter what happens.

MountWater6.name: Tamed Dragon-neck
MountWater6.description: Domesticated dragon-necked turtles are free to cruise about the Deep Sea. The spines on their shells go through a procedure to ensure that there is no longer any poison to pose any risk. Can only be used in the Deep Sea.

leibiliya.name: Rubilia
leibiliya.description: Form doesn't matter as much as significance.

Mount_019.name: Enigmatic Stag
Mount_019.description: Prototyped after a deer, this vehicle can be powered and piloted through the use of timestamp energy. Its four-legged design renders it well-suited for the mountainous terrain of Domain 9, with the trade-off being a rather bumpy ride.

Mount_020.name: Bionic Hornmane
Mount_020.description: A byproduct of Yuheng's research, these creatures were cultivated using genetic technology to assimilate information on the Darkness obtained in combat. Although it resembles an organic hornmane, it will not attack humans. This has allowed some to use them as mounts.

Mount_020_a.name: Taming Bell
Mount_020_a.description: Necessary for controlling Bionic Hornmanes. Through this device, the hornmane gains the ability to understand and obey instructions.

Mount_020_b.name: Hornmane: Power Core
Mount_020_b.description: Auxiliary exoskeleton energy source of the Bionic Hornmane. Improves durability upon installation.

Mount_021.name: Tamed Tricoon
Mount_021.description: A tricoon tamed from a young age. It is gentle and docile, and can be used as a mount. It is highly intelligent and can understand some human language with training, making it an excellent companion.

Avatar_85.name: Harrah
Avatar_85.description: The hunter is also the hunted.

Avatar_86.name: Let's Write
Avatar_86.description: Let's write with Liu Huo! Huh? Did I write something wrong?

Avatar_87.name: Scholar
Avatar_87.description: If you stay still, everything will be solid as steel.

Avatar_88.name: Vermilion Fairy
Avatar_88.description: I'm a natural beauty and intelligent beyond compare, and my skill in martial arts is... outstanding! My legend will be passed down for generations throughout the world.

Avatar_89.name: Maple Girl
Avatar_89.description: Named after maple leaves that can be seen anywhere in Ignisville. It's more like a spiritual pursuit of hermitage in the city.

Avatar_90.name: Reed Warrior
Avatar_90.description: I go to school and help out with the housework from Monday through Friday, and I practice martial arts on the weekend. Reed Warrior's daily routine is both disciplined and respectful.

Avatar_92.name: Huang's Arrival
Avatar_92.description: The beautiful and pleasing spring has arrived with Madam Huang.

Avatar_93.name: Zhuyan
Avatar_93.description: Something bad happens every time it appears. Since then, people referred to it as an ancient mythical creature.

Avatar_94.name: Zongyun's Vision
Avatar_94.description: It's got dragon horns and tails.

Avatar_95.name: Excited Tata
Avatar_95.description: National Maritime Museum Collab Rewards. Sun, beach, sea waves, and—new friends from the ocean! Weeeeeeee!

AvatarFrame_86.name: Write 'Em Up
AvatarFrame_86.description: Look beyond the words! The goal is to excel in both writing and martial arts!

AvatarFrame_87.name: Painting
AvatarFrame_87.description: Even though it's been rated as an inferior piece of work, the sentiment it holds is undeniable. To the beloved Ignisville.

AvatarFrame_88.name: Fairy's Dressing Case
AvatarFrame_88.description: To keep your elegancy 24/7, please carry this at all times.

AvatarFrame_89.name: Maple & Jade
AvatarFrame_89.description: The maple leaf dyes the memory, and everyone finds their own path at the end.

AvatarFrame_90.name: In the Name of Warriorhood
AvatarFrame_90.description: It's a long way with heavy burdens to become a warrior. Let's wait and see.

AvatarFrame_91.name: Full Moon Reunion
AvatarFrame_91.description: May we enjoy the beautiful scenery of Jade Pavilion together.

AvatarFrame_92.name: Bamboo Court Clear Skies
AvatarFrame_92.description: The scenery of flowers in bloom under a clear sky is right here.

AvatarFrame_93.name: Bronze Shackles
AvatarFrame_93.description: It is not only power that will be released once it has been unshackled.

AvatarFrame_94.name: Clear Clouds
AvatarFrame_94.description: Watch the clouds return as you ride the azure dragon.

AvatarFrame_95.name: Shy Sprigy
AvatarFrame_95.description: National Ocean Museum Collab Rewards. "Hmm... Ahem..." She is a giant squid and goes by the name, Sprigy.

liuhuo.name: Liu Huo
liuhuo.description: Also known as "The blaze of Ignisville"!

yulan.name: Yu Lan
yulan.description: The path of practice is rather difficult. Are you ready for it?

Mount006_32_Skin_01.name: Starlit Cosmos

mingjing.name: Ming Jing

Mount_Racing_003.name: Bluefrost Bloom

linghan.name: Ling Han

nanyin.name: Nan Yin
nanyin.description: As the music sounds, the musician has already gone.

Mount_023.name: Ink Fox

Mount_024.name: Taming Potion Pack
Mount_024.description: A scientific research achievement of the Wildlife Research Institute. Users of this potion tend to become docile.

Avatar_97.name: Heartsong
Avatar_97.description: "Things are looking up." I certainly hope this is more than just empty words of encouragement...

Avatar_98.name: Summer Break
Avatar_98.description: Mi-a is on vacation. Program has been halted!

Avatar_99.name: Shirli: Journey
Avatar_99.description: It's me, Shirli, and I'm looking forward to taking on this journey with you!

Avatar_100.name: Nemesis: New Life
Avatar_100.description: Oh, it's you again, Wanderer. I mean, it's been a while... How have you been lately?

Avatar_101.name: Seaside Beauty
Avatar_101.description: Dance with the sea, embracing with tenderness.

Avatar_102.name: Sparrotail
Avatar_102.description: An elite Domain Guard of Ignisville under the leadership of Zhuque. Each bears distinct fates under their standardized equipment.

Avatar_103.name: Snowy
Avatar_103.description: Snowy, the latest smart servant, reports to you!

Avatar_104.name: Childish Laughter

Avatar_105.description: Amidst jade pipes, clouds take flight; mystic mists veil the hidden light. Nan Yin has long mastered the art of the bamboo flute. As a renowned maestro, her melodies compel all to pause and listen.

Avatar_106.name: Prisoner
Avatar_106.description: Watch out for the flashing purple light. That's the color of the desire to kill.

Avatar_108.name: Taotie

Avatar_111.name: Princess Woodley
Avatar_111.description: This is a gesture I just learned, and it seems to be very suitable for the current situation.

Avatar_112.name: Ms. Jumpy
Avatar_112.description: Are you intending to scare Ruby like this...

Avatar_113.name: Little Spirit
Avatar_113.description: You'll regret seeing this side of me!!!

kelaodiya_lv2.name: Claudia: Awakened

yanuo.name: Yanuo
yanuo.description: Let's polish this gem of friendship together to make it even more radiant.

Mount_026.name: Wondrous Vessel

Shift the gear to the highest and prepare your ears for the thunderous roar of the exhaust pipe.

Avatar_120.description: "Wishing for a piece of chocolate, sweet and unforgettable."
